briefTitle: A Phase III Safety Study of Ferumoxytol Compared to Ferric Carboxymaltose for the Treatment of Iron Deficiency Anemia (IDA)
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Multicenter, Double-Blind, Safety Study of Ferumoxytol Compared to Ferric Carboxymaltose for the Treatment of Iron Deficiency Anemia (IDA)
summary: To evaluate the safety of 1.020 grams (g) of intravenous (IV) ferumoxytol compared to 1.500 g of IV ferric carboxymaltose (FCM).

primaryOutcome.measure: Participants With Treatment-Emergent (TE) Moderate To Severe Hypersensitivity Reactions (Rxns), Including Anaphylaxis, Or Moderate To Severe Hypotension
